title: old beautiful sans serif
content:
hey everybody,

i need to know what font this is.  
the letterhead was designed in the seventies, but i think the font is much older and maybe wonâ€™t even be available in digital form.

the only close result i got through whatthefont was [kylemott](http://web.archive.org/web/20090913130557/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/typotheticals/kylemott/bold/) (only its capitals)

does someone know more about this? i know some people here know a lot about the history of grotesk and some forgotten typefaces.

thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090913130557im_/http:/typophile.com/files/scan_woelfli_6158.jpg)
author: dansolbach

comments.content:
Very similar:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/suitcase/nudista/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090913130557/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/suitcase/nudista/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/suitcase/nudista/")

In any case, it seems a Din variant (the G is the most peculiar).

oh yes. very similar.

yeah, i also first thought of DIN, but the G and the S are different.
